, Kanat Saudabayev exchanged views on prospects of development of the Kazakh-U.S. strategic partnership. Colin Powell said this partnership is based on solid foundations of cooperation in politics, economics, and security and should be strongly encouraged. Kanat Saudabayev briefed Colin Powell on the outcome of Kazakhstan's OSCE chairmanship and the decisions of the Astana summit, the ministry reported. The meeting with Former National Security Adviser Brent Scowcroft discussed the current state and prospects of the nuclear nonproliferation regime, as well as development of nuclear power in the world. shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.
